verses.verse: What <S%G4159><s%> is the source <S%G4159><s%> of quarrels <S%G4171><s%> and conflicts <S%G3163><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you? Is not the source <S%G1782><s%> your pleasures <S%G2237><s%> that wage <S%G4754><s%> war <S%G4754><s%> in your members <S%G3196><s%>?

You lust <S%G1937><s%> and do not have; <S%G2192><s%> [so] you commit <S%G5407><s%> murder. <S%G5407><s%> And you are envious <S%G2206><s%> and cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> obtain; <S%G2013><s%> [so] you fight <S%G3164><s%> and quarrel. <S%G4170><s%> You do not have <S%G2192><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> you do not ask. <S%G154><s%>

You ask <S%G154><s%> and do not receive, <S%G2983><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> with wrong <S%G2560><s%> motives, <S%G2560><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that you may spend <S%G1159><s%> [it] on your pleasures. <S%G2237><s%>

You adulteresses, <S%G3428><s%> do you not know <S%G3609><s%> that friendship <S%G5373><s%> with the world <S%G2889><s%> is hostility <S%G2189><s%> toward God <S%G2316><s%>? Therefore <S%G3767><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G1014><s%> to be a friend <S%G5384><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> makes <S%G2525><s%> himself an enemy <S%G2190><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> do you think <S%G1380><s%> that the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> speaks <S%G3004><s%> to no <S%G2761><s%> purpose: <S%G2761><s%> "He jealously <S%G5355><s%> desires <S%G1971><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He has made <S%G2733><s%> to dwell <S%G2733><s%> in us"?

But He gives <S%G1325><s%> a greater <S%G3173><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%> Therefore <S%G1352><s%> [it] says, <S%G3004><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> is opposed <S%G498><s%> to the proud, <S%G5244><s%> but gives <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble. <S%G5011><s%>"
Submit <S%G5293><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%> Resist <S%G436><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> and he will flee <S%G5343><s%> from you.

Draw <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and He will draw <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to you. Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> your hands, <S%G5495><s%> you sinners; <S%G268><s%> and purify <S%G48><s%> your hearts, <S%G2588><s%> you double-minded.

Be miserable <S%G5003><s%> and mourn <S%G3996><s%> and weep; <S%G2799><s%> let your laughter <S%G1071><s%> be turned <S%G3346><s%> into mourning, <S%G3997><s%> and your joy <S%G5479><s%> to gloom. <S%G2726><s%>
Humble <S%G5013><s%> yourselves in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and He will exalt <S%G5312><s%> you.

Do not speak <S%G2635><s%> against <S%G2635><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%> He who speaks <S%G2635><s%> against <S%G2635><s%> a brother, <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> speaks <S%G2635><s%> against <S%G2635><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> and judges <S%G2919><s%> the law; <S%G3551><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> you judge <S%G2919><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> you are not a doer <S%G4163><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> but a judge <S%G2923><s%> [of it.]

There is [only] one <S%G1520><s%> Lawgiver <S%G3550><s%> and Judge, <S%G2923><s%> the One who is able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> and to destroy; <S%G622><s%> but who <S%G5101><s%> are you who judge <S%G2919><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%>?

Come <S%G33><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> you who say, <S%G3004><s%> "Today <S%G4594><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> tomorrow, <S%G839><s%> we shall go <S%G4198><s%> to such <S%G3592><s%> and such <S%G3592><s%> a city, <S%G4172><s%> and spend <S%G4160><s%> a year <S%G1763><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> and engage <S%G1710><s%> in business <S%G1710><s%> and make <S%G4160><s%> a profit. <S%G2770><s%>"

Yet <S%G3748><s%> you do not know <S%G1987><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> your life <S%G2222><s%> will be like tomorrow. <S%G839><s%> You are [just] a vapor <S%G822><s%> that appears <S%G5316><s%> for a little <S%G3641><s%> while <S%G3641><s%> and then <S%G1899><s%> vanishes <S%G853><s%> away. <S%G853><s%>

Instead, <S%G473><s%> [you ought] to say, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> wills, <S%G2309><s%> we shall live <S%G2198><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> that."
But as it is, you boast <S%G2744><s%> in your arrogance; <S%G212><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> is evil. <S%G4190><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> to one who knows <S%G3609><s%> [the] right <S%G2570><s%> thing <S%G2570><s%> to do, <S%G4160><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> not do <S%G4160><s%> it, to him it is sin. <S%G266><s%>
